animeDescription: A village in danger, a mysterious child, warring daimyo, and the greatest ronin never known all clash in a Japan of magic and mechs. Learn the story of the first African samurai.  (Source: Netflix)
animeStaff: [['Thomas LeSean', ['Director', 'Executive Producer']], ['Satou Takeshi', ['Director']], ['Koike Takeshi', ['Character Design']], ['Ellison Steven', ['Music']]]
